vsParam:
Ahhhh... Wh-what to do?
This can't be restored, can it? Let me think. Let me think...

Uh? What's going on, Escha?
Why are you so flustered...

Wow, so many delicious desserts!
... Hmm, leftovers?

Ah! Ate too much?
Haha, I was just kidding...

Yes. Someone commissioned me to make those desserts,
I got hungry while making them...

So I wanted to taste them... But there are few of them left
before I realized it.

And I've used up all the ingredients...
Boo-hoo, I'm such an idiot...
So you are a glutton, huh? Escha.

Boo-hoo, don't be so straightforward!
I just wanted to know how they taste, and then...

That's... alright, calm down now!
Take a deep breath, breathe in~ breathe out~

A-anyway, I have to gather ingredients to remake them!
Ingredients, ingredients... Oh my!?

Hehe, take your time and speak slowly. We'll wait.
Don't fall down...

Boohoo... Ah, right! Guys... May I ask if you guys could
help me gather ingredients?

Uh, got it!
Ah, but before that...

Anyway...
Wipe the cream on the corner of your mouth ♪

Oh!?
Why, why didn't you... say it earlier!

Phew... Thank you, guys!
We finally made it!

Er, that's wonderful!
Don't sample taste too much next time, alright?
Sure, I'll only eat a little next time.

With everyone's help, I had some leftover ingredients,
so I made some extra!
Taste them if you don't mind!

Wow, really!?
Actually, I do want to try them ♪

Me, too!
I'm going to start... Uh... er!?
S-so good! This... is so yummy!?

Yes! No wonder Escha ate too much.
Er! I can finish all of them!

Hehe. I'm glad that
you guys like my desserts so much!

Ah, let me check the commissioned quantity...
It's OK. You can have some more!

Er... Guys?
I think we have eaten enough...

Me, too!
Just one more piece...

Escha, Sorel... I understand your fondness
for the desserts, but you really can't eat any more!

Hmm, you niggard, Anise!
I just want one more piece. There are so many...

No! We need to deliver first!
[px] and Cresson, come help me.
Oh, OK! We'll take all these!
